Headline: Covid testing system ‘carnage’ could keep foreign holidays on hold | News | The Times
Text: Holidaymakers face missing out on summer breaks as testing laboratories struggle to return results on time, Which? has warned.The private testing system is already being pushed to the brink of collapse even though Britons are only allowed to travel to a tiny number of countries, the consumer group said.Which? said it would be “carnage” when more countries are added to the green list, as anticipated this month.Rory Boland, travel editor of Which?, said: “The best-case scenario is that you’ve booked a package holiday and the test is booked with the tour operator.
